title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 472.1 - Purpose and scope
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 472.1 - Purpose and scope

State Regulations
(a) The

Division of State Police is responsible for the establishment and operation of
a pistol and revolver ballistic databank pursuant to the provisions of section
396-ff of the New York State General Business Law. This automated electronic
ballistic databank shall be known as the Combined Ballistic Identification

System (CoBIS). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
472.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
